headline.print_headline: Kevin Klein’s First Two-Goal Game Sends Rangers Past Ducks
headline.main: Kevin Klein’s First Two-Goal Game Sends Rangers Past Ducks

snippet: Klein broke a tie with less than seven minutes left, capping the first two-goal game of his 11-year career and giving the Rangers a win to start their three-game California trip.
lead_paragraph: Klein broke a tie with less than seven minutes left, capping the first two-goal game of his 11-year career and giving the Rangers a win to start their three-game California trip.
